Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
optimize \op"ti*mize`\ ([o^]p"t[i^]*m[imac]z`) v. t. [imp. & p. p. {optimized} ([o^]p"t[i^]*m[imac]zd`); p. pr. & vb. n. {optimizing} ([o^]p"t[i^]*m[imac]`z[i^]ng).] 1. To make as useful, effective, or functional as possible; as, to optimize the speed of a computer program.
Syn: optimise. [WordNet 1.5]
2. To get the most out of; to use to the best effect; to exploit fully; as, to optimize one's return on investment.
Syn: make optimal, optimise. [WordNet 1.5]
